appsgate.lig.manager.space.spec.subSpace
Class UserSpace

java.lang.Object
  appsgate.lig.manager.space.spec.subSpace.Space
      appsgate.lig.manager.space.spec.subSpace.UserSpace

public class UserSpace
extends Space

This class is AppsGate end user implementation. It describe how a end user is represent in the AppsGate context.

Since:
February 14, 2014
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cédric Gérard
